main.name: Jan To Tong
main.description: looking for a job opening in
main.bio:
I graduated from San José State University with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science in May of 2021.
Now, I am looking forward to the next step of my career, which is to get a job in the field of software engineering.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

work.title: Software Intern
description: Developed a web-based key word recorder to collect key word audio files with a silence trimming feature
Worked on a smart home device project utilizing Ultra Wide-band technology
Integrated Raspberry Pi with MDEK1001 to implement a Real-Time Locating System (RTLS)

work.company: Applied Science and Technology Research Institute (Hong Kong)
work.title: Project Intern
description: Developed a customized micro Linux operating system kernel (336 kB) with C
Worked with team members and team lead to fulfil requirements within a limited timeframe
Advocated unit testing within the team to improve code coverage and product ownership
